content.user_title: Create Viral Social Media Content with AI
content.value_statement: Transform raw content ideas into high-performing social media posts using proven viral templates. The workflow combines data-driven structure with audience psychology to create engaging content that gets shared.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes input素材 and matches it to 4 content templates (hot takes, counter-narrative, humor, tutorials)
Generates 3 content versions: viral style, deep analysis, and hybrid fusion
Creates 4 hook variations for each piece (counter-intuitive, pain-point, results-driven, suspense)
Scores content potential across curiosity, resonance, clarity, and shareability
limitations: Does not create images or videos - text-only content generation
Does not publish to social media platforms directly
Requires user to provide initial素材 (source material or topic)
Language support focused on Chinese content style

faq.question: What is Defou x Stanley workflow?
faq.answer: A content creation system combining structured thinking (Defou) with viral content techniques (Stanley).

faq.question: What are the 4 templates?
faq.answer: T1 (hot take news), T2 (counter-narrative), T3 (humor吐槽), T4 (tutorial/educational).

faq.question: How many versions does it generate?
faq.answer: Three: A (viral style), B (deep analysis), C (hybrid fusion with best of both).

faq.question: Does it create images?
faq.answer: No. This is text-only content generation. Images must be sourced separately.

faq.question: Can I use this for English content?
faq.answer: The framework works for any language, but templates are optimized for Chinese social media style.

faq.question: Does it post automatically?
faq.answer: No. The skill generates content drafts. You review and publish to platforms yourself.
